WorkItem.Description:
Would it be possible to handle the "+/- Infinity" value in the min/max functions?
Currently, it raises an exception...

It would be great if: 
Min(Infinity, 0) returns 0
Max(Infinity,0) returns Infinity

If you think it is relevant, could you please add this? 
If you don't, I will try to create a custom function.

Thanks a lot for this great tool.
